page.title: 08FARMLAND AROUND CUFFLEY.
page.content: A lot of our block is covered by farmland.About an eighth of it belongs to Cattlegate Farm.Cattlegate's farm buildings are not in our block, but most of their land is. They have about 320acres of wheat in our area.In June Cattlegate open their strawberry fields to the public,who pick their own for purchase.A lot of farmland in the area is grazing land for cattle.The majority of the farms are mixed. There are some beef rearers.On Brook Farm where I live we keep cattle for beef and dairy products.In the summer, my father,Mr. Thomas, takes the 120 cows across the A121 to graze. Brook Farm has 230acres,about 40 of which are grain.We also make a lot of silage for winter.Nyn Manor Farm has a large herd of Charolais Cattle and they also make a certain amount of hay for winter feed. by GARETH THOMAS.
